<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|ヘラジカ|大鹿 (the animal)}}

===Etymology 2===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|大鹿村|大鹿 (the village)}}
{{wikipedia|Ōshika, Nagano}}
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|おお|しか|yomi=k}}
Compound of {{com|ja|sort=おおしか|大|tr1=ō|t1=big|鹿|tr2=shika|t2=deer}}. Appears to be a variation on ''ōjika'' above.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|おおしか|acc=h|acc_ref=NHK|y=k|dev=3}}

====Proper noun====
{{ja-pos|proper|おおしか}}

# a [[village]] in [[Nagano]]
# {{surname|lang=ja|sort=おおしか}}

===Etymology 3===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|だい|ろく|yomi=o}}
Probably coined in Japan from {{etyl|ltc|-}}-derived components, as {{com|ja|sort=たいろく'|大|tr1=dai|t1=great|鹿|tr2=roku|t2=stag, male deer}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|y=go|だいろく}}

====Noun====

# {{lb|ja|shogi|sort=たいろく'}} the [[great]] [[stag]], a [[piece]] in [[w:Taikyoku shogi|taikyoku shogi]]
